mapper.select: SELECT s.contract_code, s.shop_name, c.contract_owner_name, s.shop_address FROM shop s INNER JOIN contract c ON s.contract_code = c.contract_code ORDER BY s.contract_code DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}
SELECT category_code, category_small FROM category WHERE category_code LIKE '0%'

SELECT s.contract_code, c.contract_owner_name, s.shop_name, s.shop_address, s.shop_call, s.shop_postcode, s.shop_size FROM shop s INNER JOIN contract c ON s.contract_code = c.contract_code WHERE s.contract_code = #{contractCode}
